message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know will be highly valuable to your business.  While I can't disclose specifics right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $1 million to the right buyer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900,000. This is a significant opportunity for you to gain a competitive edge.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
